Hello all! My name is TimberWolffe and I'll be your host for tonight! In this thread, I'll be finding out what parts you, the community want, because I am not at all creative or imaginative and I seriously need help with this!

Basically, I want to make a parts pack. What's gonna be in it? well, a few new resources (which kinda fit in with KSP 'lore'), a bunch(ish) of new parts, and if I can convince someone to help out, maybe a plugin to tweak some gameplay!

Why haven't I made it already? Well..I said it earlier. I am unimaginative and uncreative and I suck. Big time.

So yeah help me pls
